channel.title: How do I change the lvlReq?
channel.description:
Hi, I have recently changed the max level from 100 to 99, but when I edit what stalls you can steal from or weild items, it says you need 100, this is what I found when I searched it:
[code]sendMessage("You need a theiving level of "+lvlReq+" to theif from this stall.");[/code]
I want to change the lvlReq to 99, how do I do it?
Thanks
Musicmad441

item.title: How do I change the lvlReq?
item.dc:creator: @musicmad441 Musicmad
item.description:
@musicmad441 wrote:

I have no return 100 in my client.java

Read full topic

item.title: How do I change the lvlReq?
item.dc:creator: @Soul_Breaker Soul Breaker
item.description:
@Soul_Breaker wrote:

Try changing “+lvlReq+” to only the number 99

item.title: How do I change the lvlReq?
item.dc:creator: @dd1 dd
item.description:
@dd1 wrote:

Find sendMessage("You need a theiving level of "+lvlReq+" to theif from this stall.")

Then paste it here.
